feature.description: If specified, this feature renderer will not be rendered.
feature.markdownDescription: If specified, this feature renderer will not be rendered.

features.description: If specified, these feature renderers will not be rendered.
features.markdownDescription: If specified, these feature renderers will not be rendered.

type.description:
## Prevent Feature Render

---


[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/prevent_feature_render)

Prevents certain [Feature Renderers](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/prevent_feature_render) (like the wool coat of a Sheep, the worn armor of a mob, etc.) from rendering on the entity that has the power.

Type ID: `origins:prevent_feature_render`

---

### Examples

```json
{
    "type": "origins:prevent_feature_render",
    "features": [
        "armor",
        "held_item",
        "elytra"
    ]
}
```

This example will make the worn armor, held item and worn Elytra of the entity that has this power disappear as if they weren't wearing or holding an item.

### Examples

This example will make the worn armor, held item and worn Elytra of the entity that has this power disappear as if they weren't wearing or holding an item.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Prevent Feature Render date: 2021-12-04

Prevent Feature Render

Power Type

Prevents certain Feature Renderers (like the wool coat of a Sheep, the worn armor of a mob, etc.) from rendering on the entity that has the power.

Type ID: origins:prevent_feature_render

Fields

Field Type Default Description
feature Feature Renderer optional If specified, this feature renderer will not be rendered.
features Array of Feature Renderers optional If specified, these feature renderers will not be rendered.

Examples

{
    "type": "origins:prevent_feature_render",
    "features": [
        "armor",
        "held_item",
        "elytra"
    ]
}

This example will make the worn armor, held item and worn Elytra of the entity that has this power disappear as if they weren't wearing or holding an item.
